graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:CommonCreateAttachmentFamilyInput!)
{
	commonCreateAttachmentFamily (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonGetAttachmentFamilies (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonFindAttachmentFamily (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	commonFindAttachmentFamilyById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:CommonUpdateAttachmentFamilyInput!)
{
	commonUpdateAttachmentFamily (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	commonDeleteAttachmentFamilyById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonDeleteAttachmentFamilies (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		width
		height
		fitType
		quality
		sizes
		format
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
